title: Sweet Potato Casserole (Grain Free, Paleo, Primal)
directions: Preheat oven to 350ÂºF and adjust rack to middle position. Place sweet potatoes, honey, eggs, butter, coconut milk, vanilla and salt in a mixing bowl. Mash potatoes and stir until all ingredients are thoroughly mixed. Pour into an 11 x 7-inch baking dish.

Place almond flour, coconut flour, honey, salt and butter in a medium mixing bowl. Stir until combined. Stir in pecans. Sprinkle pecan mixture in an even layer over the sweet potatoes. Bake for 20 minutes until golden brown.
ingredients: 3 cups baked sweet potatoes (about 5 large potatoes)
1/2 cup unsalted butter or ghee, melted
